alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; New River Mesa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 6:31PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 730 PM MST... At 631 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New River, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New River, Cave Creek, Lake Pleasant, and Anthem. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 220 and 237. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 20 and 30. AZ Route 303 between mile markers 133 and 139. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; New River Mesa
